acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was given to the Library on August 30, 1966.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection contains a manuscript of the poem, "The Necessity for Belief," n.d. (TMsS, 1 p.), and a letter, September 18, 1955, from Robert Penn Warren to Allen W. Schultz in which he agrees to inscribe a copy of Band of Angels, and says he is glad for the reasons that Schultz liked it (TLS, w/ env., 1 p.).
